storyInfo: In the alley, the Doctor, with the other Rhodes Islanders, studies the power armor and the mysterious silver substance within. Outside the city, the Pioneers, now enjoying a moment of safety, refuse to trust Dorothy.

attributes.text: What is the nature of Originium Arts?
The Spire Casters of Leithanien and the academicians of Columbia each developed their own separate theories.
Of course, both are simply packaging for the benefit of their respective adherents. Regardless of any differences in terminology, the two theories describe the same relationships.
Originium Arts involve the caster exerting influence on external matter through a medium, i.e., an Arts Unit.
The Arts Unit receives and encodes the caster's neural activity, releasing it as energy that interacts with matter or its component particles, resulting in the desired effect.
Modern Arts Units are the product of advances in both theory and industry, with complex energy conversion circuits at their core. Clearly, not all Originium products are suited for this purpose.
However, we cannot ignore how the Infected are able to use Arts without an Arts Unit, using their infected organs to similar effect.
We've all heard the terrifying rumors of Leithanian Spire Casters using one or more Infected as a medium for casting, in effect turning them into massive energy conversion circuits.
Of course, such blatant ethical violations would never be allowed in Columbia.
What about safe, artificial implants that could serve the same purpose, though?

Just as those who've lost their legs in accidents can walk again with prosthetics, or those born blind can see with cornea transplants, those without the ability to use Originium Arts may, one day, harness the same power.
I'm seeing some shocked faces in the audience. Let me emphasize that this is all hypothetical for now.
But I was invited here today by my alma mater to talk about the research that our institute is currently conducting.
And ever since I was student, I've wanted to do more for Columbia using Originium Arts, for everyone in this rapidly evolving society.
Leithanien distributes social resources according to Originium Arts Assimilation.
Here in Columbia, however, we believe that all men are created equal.
Address to the Trimounts Institute of Technology by Loken Williams, founder of Loken Watertank Laboratory

attributes.content: Composition analysis failed.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Liquid does not match any known compound.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Look.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: White crystals form at her fingertips, spreading to cover her entire hand and forearm.
It is a scene that you just saw, and which is as familiar to you from combat reports as from your own experience.
Saria does not answer.
Suddenly, she raises her hand, and you find her fist in front of your nose faster than you can blink.
You hear the sound of mineral impacting metal, and know that Mechanist blocked the attack for you.
Before you can catch your breath, you feel something cold touch your neck.
Saria's other hand never moved.
But there is a calcified blade at your throat, nonetheless.
You instinctively hold your breath.
Explain yourself, Saria.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: This is the quickest way to explain it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: My Originium Arts reconstruct matter containing calcium, at a molecular level. This is what you call calcification.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I can control the enamel formed this way using my mind, without the need to move.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No radio signals or programs.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: They are like an extension of my limbs.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Do you mean the power armor—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: A power armor is nothing more than a power armor.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: This silvery liquid is the key.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It's the neurotransmitter of the power armor, linking the brainwaves of the operator to the machine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Like an Arts Unit?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: More than that, I should say.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: An intuitive explanation.;I need to catch my breath...

attributes.content: Sorry if I've caused any discomfort.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I would not have gone for the Doctor's hand, were it not for that gesture to me.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Good thing we know each other so well.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: There's someone I want to see.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: As far as I know, he's the first to actually use this prototype power armor.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I would like you to come, with Mechanist.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You saw them go into a bar near the university?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am. All three of them.
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: I can guess who it is Saria's looking for.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: We just saw him last week.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Didn't he agree not to meet anyone from Rhine Lab?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: Is Saria still Rhine?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I don't think she knows the answer herself.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Should we stop them?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I'm curious how much Saria knows.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: It's about time we had a talk.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: And one more thing... Loken Williams is a graduate of the Trimounts Institute of Technology.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Loken Williams...? Who is that?
attributes.name: Columbian Mercenary

attributes.content: I guess time really does fly.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: One accident, and everyone forgets the brightest star of academia.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Saria and the Control of Rhine Lab went to the same school.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Social gatherings in Columbia's tech sector are basically all TIT reunions.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: I wish I could've spent some time at that school myself.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Let's go. Maybe it's not too late to join the fun.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The last fire bomb!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Throw it! Far as you can!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Here goes!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: With me! Get inside!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We got everybody?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Whew... yes, sir. All present and accounted for.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: What about the monsters?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Not yet. The flask's still burning, looks like it's got their attention.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Thank you, everyone.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We have all of the injured.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What's next, Doc Silence?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sir, the door—
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: It won't open! What the hell is going on?!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: You lock that door, Doc?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I've never been to this test site before.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dr. Urbica?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The lab doors are automatic.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But it's locked!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What are you complaining about? Aren't you afraid of those silver constructs outside?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: How're we supposed to know if you're trying to keep them out, or keep us in?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Maybe you planned all this!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Are you joking?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hah! You're saying I somehow made you kidnap me?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Watch it! You're our prisoner, don't forget!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Sam!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You're the one who said these whitecoats are fooling us!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: No, be quiet for a sec—
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You hear it, Doc Silence? A rustle, like something slithering on the ground...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Do not stop, and do not look back.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Push open the third door on your right.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: It opened!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Do not be afraid. I will protect you.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: As always.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Test results for the latest batch of Transmitter?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: In a laboratory environment, of course...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: A one-point-seven percent increase in efficiency.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: A massive breakthrough in one month.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Excellent work. Do you need more time? Ten days? Twenty?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: S-Sorry! Whoa...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Come now, don't frighten the youths like that.
No wonder the staff so fear the accolades of the Director of Energy.
Come to boast about your people skills, Parvis?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Just passing through.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Back to your lab now, poor little fellow, I'll keep your director company for a bit.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Er, alright, ok!
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Rhine Lab Tech

attributes.content: Ahah! So quick on his feet. Such is youth, eh? Gone in a flash.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: I don't see you outside your lab often, except for directors' meetings.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: What brings you here, exactly?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Where do I even start? The brain doesn't spin so fast at my age.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: You were born with white hair, Caprinae.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Oh, now I remember. Do you know where Muelsyse is?
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: We made a bet. She wagered ten boxes of black bean tea from hydroponics in Ecological.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: A bet?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Two days ago, she told me that you were planning to rid Ferdinand Clooney's name of the 'Director' title.
attributes.name: Parvis

attributes.content: Sonny...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why did you stop?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We can't do this.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Do what?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We can't follow that voice.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The voice... you mean Director Franks?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sonny, Director Franks knows this lab better than anyone, better than Elena or myself. She knows where we'll be safe.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's why I don't trust her!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't you see? She's pulling our strings, guiding every step, drilling into our minds...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: She's walking us right into her cage, and we're going along with it!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Please calm down, Sonny. Getting excited could exacerbate your condition.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Lemme go! Get away from me!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Oof...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia! Are you okay?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's enough, Pioneer.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I would have left you outside, if Olivia didn't insist we help you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Ha, like we wanted to be here with you in the first place.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I don't understand. At all.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dorothy was so kind to you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: How's your son, Dirk?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Not so good, Director Franks. The doctor says he needs an operation.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Is it the cost?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Nothing gets past you. I joined the Pioneer Team to try to help my boy. This is my first project.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: We don't have much money. I shouldn't've spent any on Oripathy medicine. If only I knew my son had heart trouble.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: There's no hope for me, but him... he's still so little...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't worry, Dirk. I know a way.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Here's the best heart surgeon I know. Take your son and find her.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: The best surgeon? In Trimounts?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Must be awful pricey...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: She's an old classmate of mine. Tell her Dorothy Franks sent you, and she'll give you a discount.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't tell anybody. It'd be bad for her reputation if word got out that she gives discounts.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Won't tell a soul! Cross my heart!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I... I gotta go! Thank your friend for me!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Why are you standing there? The coffee's getting cold.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So much the better.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It'll hurt less when I spill it on you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Are you worried about me, or the coffee?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You can smile and plead all you want, but I'm not lending you lunch money.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Looks like it's plain rice for the rest of the month then.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A director of Rhine Lab, begging for food from a low-level researcher... can you imagine the scandal?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Originium Art Section is the poorest of the five, after all.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm not Ferdinand, I don't have sponsors lined up waiting to dress me in gold from head to tail.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: At least the boss has good taste.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Back on topic, it's not like I don't know the classmate you're talking about. She probably couldn't wait to double her fee when she heard your name.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You're willing to pay anything for your Pioneer friends. No wonder people take advantage of you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hahah...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Laugh all you want. Not like I can do anything about it.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I'm going back to my lab.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Maybe finishing this experiment will help stuff your wallet a little.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: She did so much for you, and pushed me into keeping it secret.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: How could you do this to her?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dr. Urbica, you're Dorothy Franks's friend.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You see only what she wants you to see.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You don't know what terrible things she's hiding under the surface.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Director Franks! My boy's surgery went great. The doctor says he'll be out of the hospital by next week!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Fantastic. Would you like to go home and see him?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: G-Go home? Back to the city?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: B-But I'm Infected. I can't enter a nomadic city on my own...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Unless you have a new contract that pays for the insurance.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You're looking at a chance, Dirk. One that can change your destiny.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Sign this consent form, and you'll be able to go home.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Of course I...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: No rush. You have twenty-four hours to think about it.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: This isn't a trick, nothing in the fine print.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I've circled the important points. Make sure you understand the risks.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Come find me if you have any questions.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Dirk!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: S-Sir? What're you doing here? Did you sign up for...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Give me the consent form.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: W-Why? No!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Don't you get it? She's stuffing you into a cage, to experiment on!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: S-So what?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Director Franks says she's giving me a chance.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: When was the last time we heard the word 'chance'?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I don't need twenty-four hours.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I won't wait another minute for a chance to see my boy!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: That's how she got Dirk.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Not just Dirk. Alan, Gale, Sophia...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: She knew everyone's weaknesses. No one could say no to her.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: That's Dorothy Franks!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Those silver creatures were her...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The silver constructs?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: They're... *cough* *cough*... you know nothing!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: How much do the two of you know about our pursuers?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: One of you calls them creatures, the other uses the word constructs.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm certain I heard correctly. My people are renowned among Liberi for our sense of hearing.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm just guessing.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Same here.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: At least you agree on something.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Never mind that. No matter what you think of Dorothy, at this moment, she's helping us escape.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let's follow her instructions for now.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Maybe our pursuers on the other end of the corridor will help you collect your thoughts.
attributes.name: Silence
